dtbp_check.title: The {@link net.jacobpeterson.alpaca.model.endpoint.accountconfiguration.enums.DTBPCheck}. Controls Day Trading Margin Call (DTMC) checks.

trade_confirm_email.title: The {@link net.jacobpeterson.alpaca.model.endpoint.accountconfiguration.enums.TradeConfirmEmail}. If {@link net.jacobpeterson.alpaca.model.endpoint.accountconfiguration.enums.TradeConfirmEmail#NONE}, emails for order fills are not sent.

suspend_trade.title: If true, new orders are blocked.

no_shorting.title: If true, account becomes long-only mode.
